explanation: The buggy line computed the discounted total as P - Q + D[i], which is incorrect. When using the coupon the drink costs Q, so the total should be Q + D[i]. I fixed that single line to compute ret = Q + D[i].
fixed_code:
N, P, Q = map(int, input().split())
D = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = P
for i in range(N):
    ret = Q + D[i]
    ans = min(ans, ret)

print(ans)
